      • setFromOi

        public void setFromOi()
        Description copied from interface: ZeidonDisplayView
        This is called from a parent ZeidonDisplayView to set data for the android view from data in an OI. If the view has child views then it is assumed that this call will also set the values for them..
        Specified by:
        setFromOi in interface ZeidonDisplayView

      • getMappingView

        public View getMappingView()
        Description copied from interface: ZeidonDisplayView
        Gets the Zeidon view assigned to map this android View. If this returns null then the mapping view is assumed to be the same as the named view.
        Specified by:
        getMappingView in interface ZeidonDisplayView
